title: Infantry Fighting Vehicle - 2: Sound System for BMP-3
description: IFV-2 Sound System is the result of the joint work of our experienced programmers and sound designers. Over 110 BMP-3 engine and weapon sounds with all the necessary code
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE VIDEO | HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER


The "Infantry Fighting Vehicle - 2: Sound System for BMP-3," a groundbreaking digital product that elevates the realism and immersion of your gaming experience to unprecedented levels. This cutting-edge plugin, meticulously crafted in C++ with the power of Unreal Engine blueprints, delivers a meticulously detailed and controllable model of the Soviet BMP-3 infantry fighting vehicle.


  • Fully controllable 3d-model
  • The most realistic engine sounds
  • Different sounds from different RPMs, speed, gear and other vehicle's parameters
  • Weapon sounds from the weapons used by this vehicle in real life
  • Different sounds from different distance
  • Startup and Shutdown sounds
  • Cockpit sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication


At the heart of this plugin is an advanced sound system featuring approximately 60 dynamically controlled sounds of the BMP-3, alongside over 50 meticulously captured weapon sounds. Every auditory element of the vehicle is carefully synchronized with essential parameters, such as engine RPM, speed, and listener distance, ensuring an authentic auditory experience that adapts in real-time.


The plugin includes realistic audio for the 30mm 2A72 autocannon, the formidable 100mm 2A70 gun, and the PKT machine gun. Each weapon boasts its own distinct set of sounds tailored for different perspectives—whether you’re outside the vehicle, at a distance, or inside the cockpit, there are unique soundscapes that reflect each environment.


This plugin is a game-changer for AAA multiplayer shooters. Every aspect of the BMP-3's audio is replicated for multiplayer, ensuring that the immersive experience is consistent for every player. The sounds are engineered to be as close to reality as possible, with our team using original audio recordings to capture the true essence of the BMP-3 and its weaponry.


The demo scene is already included in the plugin. You just need to adjust the audio settings of the project as shown in the 'How to Use' video.
technicalDetails:
Code Module: IFV2_Sound_System (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 7

Number of C++ Classes: 5

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


HOW TO USE IT WITH OUR READY-MADE SCENE: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER: VIDEO


  • Enable "IFV2_Sound_System" and "ChaosVehiclesPlugin" from "Edit > Plugins". Restart UE
  • Adjust the audio settings of the project as shown in the 'How to Use' video
  • Open 'DemoLevel' from '/Engine/Plugins/IFV2_Sound_System Content/DemoLevel/DemoLevel.umap'.
  • DRIVE!!!


Check IFV2_SFXComponent_BP to adjust any IVF's sound settings.
